thread.section_title: Intrepid Travel Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Intrepid Travel | www.intrepidtravel.com | 4 of 10
thread.title: Paul

author: Paul
title: Paul
text:
We enjoyed our experience onboard - Zoe III and found the crew to be well experienced and friendly. The meals provided by Pui were very good, with
many options and allowances for all tastes. The accommodation was
comfortable and clean. We were greatful for the opportunity to view a
very special part Asia. We also enjoyed the company of our fellow travellers and hope to catch up with them again in various parts of the world. Many thanks Sarah and Paul Clark
